Description.Text: Facilities The hotel comprises a total of 175 rooms. A restaurant, a dining area, a bar, room service, a conference room and a business centre are available to guests of the accommodation. Various shops are available, including a souvenir shop. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the establishment. In addition, a shuttle service is offered. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with a kitchen. The rooms have a queen-size bed or a king-size bed. There is also a safe. A fridge and a tea/coffee station ensure a comfortable stay. An ironing set is also available for guests' convenience. Other features include a telephone, a TV and WiFi. Slippers are laid out in each of the rooms. The bathrooms have a shower, a bathtub and a hot tub. A hairdryer and bathrobes are provided for everyday use. The hotel offers non-smoking rooms. Sports/Entertainment The accommodation features various options for cooling off on hot days, including a pool and an outdoor pool. The hot tub is the perfect place to relax. A range of options are available, including a gym and a spa. Additional services include an entertainment programme for children, offering numerous activities. Meals Bed and breakfast is bookable. Options include breakfast.
